src:
Tabrak Trotoar di Pondok Indah, Seorang Pemotor Tewas
04 Nov 2019, 05:03 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Kecelakaan motor terjadi di kawasan Pondok Indah, Jakarta Selatan. Akibatnya, pengendara motor tewas.
"Benar, ada informasi kecelakaan pemotor menabrak trotoar di depan Bank Niaga Jl Metro Pondok Indah, Jaksel," kata petugas call center NTMC Polri, Hari saat dimintai konfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Kecelakaan di Jalan Metro Pondok Indah itu terjadi sekitar pukul 01.42 WIB. Hari menyebut indetitas pemotor yang tewas bernama Endro Wijaya Kusuma (30).
"Korban langsung dibawa ke rumah sakit," ujarnya.
Namun ia mengaku belum mengetahui informasi penyebab kecelakaan tersebut. Dia mengatakan, petugas polisi saat ini masih menangani di lokasi.
"Masih ditangani petugas Polri di lokasi," kata Hari.

(ibh/mae)
text:
Hit the Sidewalk in Pondok Indah, a Motorbike Killed
Nov 04 2019, 05:03 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Motorcycle accident occurred in Pondok Indah, South Jakarta. As a result, motorcyclists were killed.
"Right, there is information on motorbike accidents crashing on the sidewalk in front of Bank Niaga Jl Metro Pondok Indah, South Jakarta," said NTMC Polri call center officer, Hari when asked for confirmation, Monday (4/11/2019).
The accident on Jalan Pondok Indah Metro occurred around 01.42 WIB. Hari mentioned the identity of the dead motorist named Endro Wijaya Kusuma (30).
"The victim was immediately taken to the hospital," he said.
But he claimed not to know information about the cause of the accident. He said that police officers were still handling the location.
"It is still being handled by Polri officers at the location," Hari said.

(ibh / mae)
